title: Save more than 70% on our favorite VPN with NordVPN’s Black Friday sale
content:
Macworld

If you’re looking for a VPN to keep your browsing safe and secure, our top pick is NordVPN, which offers an excellent combination of speed and safety features. And now it’s cheaper than ever for Black Friday: You can lock in 27 months of NordVPN for just $96.93/£72.63 ($3.59/£2.69 a month) if you sign up for a two-year plan with three extra bonus months.

The basic plan is probably good enough for most people, but you can also get the Plus plan, which adds anti-malware protection and ad blocking for $4.49/£3.49 a month ($121.23/£94.23), or the Ultimate plan, which includes a terabyte of encrypted cloud storage for $6.49/£5.29 a month ($175.23/£142.83).

You’ll need to pay the full cost upfront and after the promotional period ends, the price will jump 70 percent. So you might want to put a reminder in your calendar to switch in two years time.

NordVPN is fast and reliable with 5,300 servers across 60 countries and a Quick Connect feature that picks the server best suited to your needs. You can connect up to 10 devices simultaneously including your Apple TV for popular streaming services around the world including Netflix and BBC iPlayer.

As we wrote in our 4.5-star review, “NordVPN is a fully featured VPN option that’s secure, easy to use, and unbelievably fast compared to its competitors.” We loved the ability to quickly switch between connections on the fly, as well as its simple interface.

So go grab this deal and don’t worry about your VPN until 2027. For more information about VPNs and other options, check out our roundup of the best VPNs for your Mac.
